characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

feat.name: Mission Critical
feat.description: While in Strakhov's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain +3 ARM, Tough and Feign Death. Mission Critical lasts for one round. (A model with Feign Death cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks while knocked down.

execution.name: Elite Cadre [Assault Kommandos] [Pathfinder]
execution.description: Friendly Assault Kommandos models gain Pathfinder. (a model with Pathfinder ignores the movement penalty of Rough [Forest] and Rough [Rubble] terrain while advancing.)

topability.name: Tactical Flexibility
topability.description: This model can use one of the following special rules at any time during each of it's activations. Strakov and friendly faction Kommandos gains the benefit listed if they are within Strakov's CMD:

subabilities.name: Quiet Advance
subabilities.description: Affected models gain Stealth for one round.

subabilities.name: Reconfiguration
subabilities.description: Affected model's gain Reposition 5" until end of turn. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.)

subabilities.name: Red Tide
subabilities.description: Affected models gain Overtake this activation. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during it's Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1”.)

ability.name: Armor-Piercing
ability.description: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the models hit.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

spells.name: Inviolable Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM and cannot be moved by a push or a slam, and have Steady. (A model with Steady cannot become knocked down)

spells.name: Last Stand
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on its melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. If an affected model makes a melee attack, it is destroyed at the end of the turn.

spells.name: Lock the Target
spells.description: A model damaged by Lock the Target cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks for one round.

spells.name: Quicken
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 SPD and DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Assault Kommander Strakhov]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Assault Kommander Strakhov and is the same faction as Assault Kommander Strakhov. If Assault Kommander Strakhov is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Assault Kommander Strakhov's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Smoke Bomb (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Centre a 3" AOE cloud effect on this model. This AOE remains in play for one round.

ability.name: Armor-Piercing
ability.description: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the models hit.

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Animosity [Blighted Models]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be part of an army that includes Blighted Models.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Nyss] [Quick Work]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Nyss models gain Quick Work. (When a model with Quick Work destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic ranged attack.)

characterabilities.name: Henchmen [Nyss Hunters]
characterabilities.description: Choose one friendly Nyss Hunters unit at the beginning of the game to be Henchmen. The chosen unit gains +2 DEF, +2 RAT, Hunter and Treewalker. (A model with hunter ignores concealment and cover when making ranged attacks.) (A model with Treewalker ignores forests when determining LOS. While completely within a forest, the model also gains +2 DEF against melee attack accuracy rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Hunter
characterabilities.description: This model ignores concealment and cover when making ranged attacks.

characterabilities.name: Irregulars [Nyss]
characterabilities.description: Nyss units can be included in any army that also includes Cylena.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Nyss Hunters]
characterabilities.description: This model may include two units of Nyss Hunters as a unit option when building an army list.

characterabilities.name: Treewalker
characterabilities.description: This model ignores forests when determining LOS. While completely within a forest, this model gains +2 DEF against melee attack accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Hail of Arrows
feat.description: While in Cylena's Control area, friendly models gain +3 RAT and their AOE ranged attacks do not cause blast damage. Instead, models hit by those attacks suffer a damage roll equal to the POW the weapon. Hail of Arrows lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Warden in the North
execution.description: "This forest is old. Very old. Full of memories....and anger.".

ability.name: Freeze
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Energizer
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in its Control Range can immediately advance up to 2". Energizer can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Fire For Effect
spells.description: Boost the attack and damage rolls of target friendly Faction model's first ranged attack each activation.

spells.name: Hoarfrost
spells.description: Hoarfrost causes cold damage. On a critical hit, models in the AOE become stationary for one round unless they have Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Razor Wind
spells.description: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

spells.name: Shatter Storm
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Detonator. (When a model with Detonator directly hits and boxes an enemy model with a ranged or melee attack, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 8 Magical Blast Damage roll.).

spells.name: Wind Blast
spells.description: Place a 5" AOE anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. Cloud effects overlapping the AOE expire. Models cannot make ranged attacks while within the AOE. The AOE remains in pay for one round.

characterabilities.name: Desperate Pace [Winter Guard] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Winter Guard unit. If the unit is in range, Winter Guard models in that unit gain +2" movement during their Normal Movement this turn.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Relentless Charge]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Relentless Charge. (A model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder while advancing as part of a charge.)

characterabilities.name: Freezer
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model without Resistance: Cold ends it's activation within 2" of this model, the enemy model becomes stationary for one round.

characterabilities.name: Relentless Charge
characterabilities.description: While advancing as part of a charge, this model gains Pathfinder.

characterabilities.name: Snow Wreathed
characterabilities.description: This model has concealment.

feat.name: Winter's Chill
feat.description: When an enemy model without Resistance: Cold suffers a damage roll while in Sorcha's Control range, double the damage that exceeds the model's ARM. Winter's Chill lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Elite Cadre [Winter Guard] [Resistance: Cold]
execution.description: Friendly Winter Guard models gain Resistance: Cold.

ability.name: Critical Freeze
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

ability.name: Shatter
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional damage die against stationary models.

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes a full advance, ignoring freestrikes during this movement. At the end of this movement, the spellcaster can make one basic melee attack against each model in its LOS that is in its melee range. Cyclone can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Escort
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spells.name: Iron Flesh
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.name: Shatter Storm
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Detonator. (When a model with Detonator directly hits and boxes an enemy model with a ranged or melee attack, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 8 Magical Blast Damage roll.).

spells.name: Winter's Wrath
spells.description: Winter's Wrath causes cold damage, on a critical hit, models hit become stationary for one round unless they have Resistance: Cold.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Channeler]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Channeler. (The controller of a model with Channeler can channel spells through it.)

characterabilities.name: Long Shadows
characterabilities.description: When a friendly Faction model in this model's CMD range is targeted by a ranged attack, the attack suffers -3 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [3]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: Storm of Ages
feat.description: Enemy models/units activating in Baranova's Control range suffer -2 SPD, cannot charge, and cannot make slam or trample power attacks. When a friendly model in Baranova's Control range is targeted by a ranged or arcane attack, the attack suffers -4 RNG. Storm of Ages lasts for one round.

execution.name: Blessed Wards
execution.description: This model gains +3 ARM against damage rolls made by Infernal or undead models.

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

spells.name: Banishing Ward
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Gallows
spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, it can be pushed d6" directly toward Gallows' point of origin.

spells.name: Invocations of Wrath
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction models gain an additional die on attack rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Invocations of Wrath lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Pathfinder]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Pathfinder. (a model with Pathfinder ignores the movement penalty of Rough [Forest] and Rough [Rubble] terrain while advancing.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Warriors of the Old Faith]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Warriors of the Old Faith armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

Howl of the Wolf accuracy rolls are boosted. A model can only advance and attack as a result of Howl of the Wolf once per game. Howl of the Wolf lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Arcane Precision
execution.description: If this model uses its Normal Movement to aim, it ignores cloud effects when determining LOS and ignores Stealth that activation.

ability.name: Reload [1]

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Critical Armor-Piercing
subabilities.description: On a critical hit, when calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the model hit.

subabilities.name: Flare
subabilities.description: Models hit by an attack with Flare lose Stealth and cannot gain Stealth and suffer -2 DEF for one round.

subabilities.name: Grievous Wounds
subabilities.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

spells.description: Center a 3" AOE on a target friendly model. The AOE is a cloud effect that remains in play for one round.

characterabilities.name: Hate Infused
characterabilities.description: The S boxes of this model's damage grid represent its Skulls of Hate system. While this model's Skulls of Hate system is not crippled, it gains +2 ARC.

characterabilities.name: Meat for the Beast
characterabilities.description: Once during each of your turns when a model in this model's battlegroup destroys an enemy model with a melee attack while in this model's Control range, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can cast a spell without spending focus.

characterabilities.name: Monster in the Machine
characterabilities.description: Karchev & Deathjack is both a living model and a construct model but is neither a warjack nor a warrior model. Karchev & Deathjack has a damage grid and suffers damage like a warjack. Karchev & Deathjack can make slam, trample, throw, and grab power attacks without spending focus but cannot make throw or Grab power attacks while his Open fist is crippled. Effects modifying the amount of damage to or the manner in which damage is applied to a warjack also apply to them. Karchev & Deathjack cannot spend focus points to remove damage.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cryx, Khador]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cryx, Khador armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.name: To the Slaughter
feat.description: While in Karchev & Deathjack's Control range, this model and models in its battlegroup are SPD 8. When an affected model ends its Normal Movement in melee with one or more enemy models, the affected model gains 1 focus point. To The Slaughter lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Regenerative Alloys
execution.description: When this model is targeted by a Repair skill, add d3 to the roll.

spells.name: Abattoir
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately make one basic melee attack. Abattoir can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM. If an affected warjack is damaged, choose which column suffers the damage. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Full Throttle
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus that activation. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted melee attack rolls. Full Throttle lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Locked Horns
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction models gain Unyielding. Locked Horns lasts for one round. (A model with Unyielding gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.).

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its Control Range gain Relentless Charge for one turn. (While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder.

characterabilities.name: Arcantrik Turbine
characterabilities.description: At the start of this model's activation, it can spend 1 focus point to gain +2" movement when advancing as part of it's Normal Movement and Pathfinder for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Man in the Machine
characterabilities.description: Karchev is a living model but is neither a warjack nor a warrior model. Karchev has a damage grid and suffers damage like a warjack. Karchev can make slam, trample, throw, and grab power attacks without spending focus but cannot make throw or Grab power attacks while his Open fist is crippled. Effects modifying the amount of damage to or the manner in which damage is applied to a warjack also apply to them. Karchev cannot spend focus to remove damage.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

feat.name: Unearthly Rage
feat.description: While in Karchev's Control range, models in his battlegroup gain boosted melee damage rolls and their melee weapons gain Damage type: Arcane. Unearthly Rage lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Eager
execution.description: This model can re-roll failed charge and slam accuracy rolls. Accuracy rolls may only be re-rolled once due to Eager.

ability.name: Knockdown
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Carnage
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to melee attack rolls against enemy models in the spellcaster's Control Range. Carnage lasts for one turn.

spells.description: This attack causes fire damage. Place a cloud effect template centered on the model targeted. The template is a hazard that remains in play for one round. A model without Resistance: Fire entering or ending its activation in the AOE suffers the Fire continuous effect.

spells.name: Ground Zero
spells.description: Center a 5" AOE on the spellcaster. Each other model in the AOE is hit and suffers a POW 13 damage roll. Immediately after this damage is resolved each enemy model damage by Ground Zero is pushed d6" directly away from the spellcaster in the order you choose.

spells.name: Jumpstart
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary. Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spells.name: Road To War
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". A warjack can advance as a result of Road to War only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Khador]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Khador non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

feat.name: Howling Wind
feat.description: While in Zerkova's Control range, enemy models cannot make ranged attacks. Enemy models beginning their activations in Zerkova's Control range cannot run, charge, make power attacks or special attacks, give or receive orders, or make special actions. Howling Wind lasts for one round.

execution.name: Gate Walker
execution.description: Once per activation, immediately after this model casts a spell, you can warp this model anywhere completely within 5" of its current location.

topability.name: Arcane Artifacts
topability.description: When this model casts a spell, you can choose to use one of the following special rules. Each special rule can be used only once per activation and expires after the spell is cast.

subabilities.name: Focus Sphere
subabilities.description: Reduce the COST of the spell by 1.

subabilities.name: Lens of Tarvodh
subabilities.description: The spell gains +5 RNG.

subabilities.name: Medallion of Ekris
subabilities.description: When determining LOS, the spellcaster gains True Sight. (This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.)

ability.name: Grave Door
ability.description: A model disabled by this weapon cannot make a Tough roll. When a living or undead enemy model is boxed by this attack, you can choose to take Control of it. If you do, remove 1 damage point from it, causing it to no longer be boxed. You can then immediately change it's facing. For the rest of the turn, this model can channel spells through the affected model while it is in this model's Control Range. This model can channel spells even while engaged. The affected model cannot activate. At the end of the turn, the affected model is destroyed.

ability.name: Silence
ability.description: A model hit by this attack cannot cast spells for one round.

spells.name: Freezing Mist
spells.description: Place a 3" AOE cloud effect completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, models without Resistance: Cold suffer -2 to their accuracy rolls. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.description: Frost Hammer causes cold damage. On a critical hit the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Ghost Walk
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes).

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spells.name: Watcher
spells.description: Once per turn when an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of the spellcaster, you can choose a Cohort model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. That Cohort model can immediately make a full advance toward the enemy model and then can make one basic attack targeting the enemy model.

characterabilities.name: Quick Work
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

feat.name: Undying Loyalty
feat.description: While in Irusk's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain +2 to accuracy attack rolls and Tough and cannot become knocked down. When a friendly Faction warrior model makes a Tough roll of 4, 5, or 6 while in Irusk's Control range, remove 1 damage point from that model. Undying Loyalty lasts for one round.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Shield Guard]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Shield Guard. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

topability.name: Battle Marshal
topability.description: This model can use two of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Kill Order
subabilities.description: RNG 10. Target enemy model/unit in this model's LOS. While within this model's command range, friendly warrior models gain +2 to accuracy and damage rolls against the chosen model/unit. Kill order lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: March
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Pathfinder for one Turn.

subabilities.name: Reveille

subabilities.name: Sneak
subabilities.description: RNG 5”. Target friendly Faction model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Prowl for one round. Sneak lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Special Orders
subabilities.description: RNG 5”. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Reposition [3”] for one turn.

ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essence to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

spells.name: Battle Lust
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains an additional die on melee damage rolls. Battle lust lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Grind
spells.description: When a warjack is hit by Grind, it suffers 1 damage point to it's first available Movement system box.

spells.name: Inhospitable Ground
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, enemy models lose and cannot regain Pathfinder for 1 round and treat open terrain as rough terrain. Inhospitable Ground lasts for one round.

spells.name: Iron Flesh
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.description: Target friendly Faction Warjack gains +2 SPD, MAT and DEF and cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

ability.name: Shatter
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional damage die against stationary models.

spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.name: Wind Rush
spells.description: The spellcaster can immediately make a full advance and gains +2 DEF for one round. Wind Rush can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Winter's Wrath
spells.description: Winter's Wrath causes cold damage, on a critical hit, models hit become stationary for one round unless they have Resistance: Cold.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Khador]
characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Khador Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Khador units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Khador Solos as well. While this model is in play friendly Soulless models gain Serenity.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Infernals]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Infernals armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Sucker!
characterabilities.description: If this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, choose a friendly non-incorporeal warrior model within 3" of it to be directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects.

feat.name: Poison Pill
feat.description: While in Malakov's Control range, friendly Faction models gain Shield Guard and Unstoppable. Additionally, when a friendly Faction model in Malakov's Control range is hit by an enemy attack except while advancing, after the attack is resolved the damaged model can make a full advance followed by a basic melee or ranged attack. A model may only advance and attack once as a result of Poison Pill. Poison Pill lasts for one round.(When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

execution.name: Call to Sacrifice [Winter Guard]
execution.description: If this model is disabled by an enemy attack, you can choose a non-disabled friendly Winter Guard model within 5" of this model to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Call to Sacrifice, remove 1 damage point from this model.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Fighting Dirty
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model. If the model is in range, a model hit by its next basic melee attack this turn becomes knocked down.

subabilities.name: Money Shot
subabilities.description: RNG 5" - Affected models gain +2 to ranged accuracy and damage rolls for one turn.

subabilities.name: Throat Cutter
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Backstab and its melee weapons gain Grevious Wounds. Throat cutter lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Discombobulate
spells.description: Both the front arc and back arc of target model/unit is treated as it's back arc.

spells.name: Escort
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spells.name: Open Fire
spells.description: Target Cohort model in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. A model can be targeted by open fire only once per turn.

spells.name: Razor Wind
spells.description: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

characterabilities.name: Iron Sentinel
characterabilities.description: While B2B with a friendly Faction warjack, this model gains +2 DEF and ARM and has Steady. (A model with Steady cannot become knocked down.)

feat.name: Hour of the Wolf
feat.description: While in Harkevich's Control range, models in his battlegroup gain +3 ARM. Models in his battlegroup beginning their activations in his Control range can charge or make slam power attacks without spending focus. A model in Harkevich's battlegroup that declares a charge or slam against an enemy model while in his Control range can make a basic ranged attack before advancing. Hour of the Wolf lasts for one round.

execution.name: Leadership [Faction Warrior] [Iron Sentinel]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Faction Warrior models gain Iron Sentinel. (While B2B with a friendly Faction warjack, a model with Iron Sentinel gains +2 DEF and ARM and has Steady. (A model with Steady cannot become knocked down.))

spells.name: Bombshell
spells.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Models thrown do not deviate. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a POW 10 damage roll. The POW of collateral damage is 10.

spells.name: Broadside
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. Broadside can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Guided Fire
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted Ranged Accuracy rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Jumpstart
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary. Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spells.name: Mobility
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Assault Kommandos] [Pathfinder]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Assault Kommandos models gain Pathfinder. (a model with Pathfinder ignores the movement penalty of Rough [Forest] and Rough [Rubble] terrain while advancing.)

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Take Down
characterabilities.description: Models disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.

feat.name: Night Raid
feat.description: While in Strakhov's Control range, friendly Faction models gain Stealth, Reposition [3"] and Take Down. Additionally, when a Friendly Faction model charges or slam power attacks an enemy model while in Strakhov's Control range they gain +4" movement when advancing as part of their normal movement and Pathfinder. Warjacks in Strakhov's battlegroup can charge or make slam power attacks targeting enemy models in Strakhov's Control range without spending focus. While in Strakhov's Control range, enemy model's ranged weapons suffer -4 RNG. Night Raid lasts for one round.(Models disabled by a melee attack made by a model with Take Down cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by a model with Take Down are removed from play.)

execution.name: Quick Work
execution.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

ability.name: Volume Fire
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against medium-based models and +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

ability.name: Cumbersome
ability.description: This model cannot make initial attacks with this weapon and another weapon on the same activation.

ability.name: Smoke
ability.description: This weapon's AOE is a cloud effect that remains in play for one round.

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

spells.name: Battering Ram
spells.description: An enemy model hit by Battering Ram can be pushed 3" directly away from the spell's point of Origin.

spells.name: Hand of Destruction
spells.description: Friendly models in this model's battlegroup gain an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls against target model/unit. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

spells.name: Overrun
spells.description: When target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup destroys one or more enemy models with an attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved one model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can make a full advance, then Overrun expires. A model can advance only once per turn as a result of Overrun. Overrun lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Sentry
spells.description: Target friendly Faction gains Rapid Fire. (A model with Rapid Fire can make one basic ranged attack during your Maintenance Phase.).

spells.name: Superiority
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Warjack gains +2 SPD, MAT and DEF and cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Dementia
characterabilities.description: Zoktavir begins the game with 7 focus and a base ARC and AAT of 7. At the start of each of your turns, if Zoktavir destroyed three or more enemy models with melee attacks during the last round, his base ARC and AAT becomes 7 for one round. Otherwise, his ARC and AAT becomes 2d3+1 for one round. Zoktavir's Control Range is alway 12".

characterabilities.name: Berserk
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

characterabilities.name: Conferred Rage
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models during its activation, warjacks in its battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and MAT for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Homicidal Maniac
characterabilities.description: If there are no models in this model's melee range after resolving a basic melee attack in which this model destroyed one or more enemy models, this model can advance up to 1".

characterabilities.name: Reckless Arcana
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when a model in this model's battlegroup destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved, this model can cast a spell with a COST 3 or less without spending focus, fury, or essence.

feat.name: Feel the Hate
feat.description: Each time an enemy model is destroyed in Zoktavir's Control range, you can place one rage token on a friendly Faction model in his Control range. A model can have up to three rage tokens at any time. Models can spend rage tokens during their activations to make additional melee attacks or to boost melee accuracy or melee damage rolls. A model can make one additional attack or boost one roll for each token spent. Feel the Hate lasts for one turn. Remove unspent rage tokens at the end of this turn.

execution.name: Affinity [Doom Reaver]
execution.description: Friendly Doom Reaver models ignore this model when making melee attacks.

spells.name: Boundless Charge
spells.description: During it's activation, target friendly faction model can charge without spending focus or being forced and gains +2 SPD and Pathfinder when it charges. Boundless Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Eliminator
spells.description: Immediately after this attack is resolved, the spellcaster can advance up to 2" for each enemy model destroyed by the attack.

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

spells.name: Ravager
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains Berserk for one turn. While affected by Ravager, a model cannot make Chain Attacks. (When a model with Berserk destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.).

feat.name: Icy Gaze
feat.description: Enemy models without Resistance: Cold currently in Sorscha's Control range and LOS become stationary for one round.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

ability.name: Critical Freeze
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

ability.name: Shatter
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional damage die against stationary models.

spells.name: Boundless Charge
spells.description: During it's activation, target friendly faction model can charge without spending focus or being forced and gains +2 SPD and Pathfinder when it charges. Boundless Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Fog of War
spells.description: Models gain concealment while in the spellcaster's Control Range.

spells.name: Freezing Grip
spells.description: Target model/unit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Razor Wind
spells.description: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.description: Models hit by Tempest become knocked down and suffer a POW 12 damage roll.

spells.name: Wind Rush
spells.description: The spellcaster can immediately make a full advance and gains +2 DEF for one round. Wind Rush can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Aggressive
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: Fortunes of War
feat.description: While in Sikora's control range, friendly Faction models gain Unyielding. Additionally, while in Sikora's control range, friendly Faction models can reroll missed accuracy rolls. Each accuracy roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Fortunes of War. Fortunes of War lasts for one round.

execution.name: Repair [d6] (★Action)
execution.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d6 damage point from it.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Desperate Pace [Man-o-War] (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Man-o-War unit. If the unit is in range, Man-o-War models in that unit gain +2" movement during their Normal Movement this turn.

ability.name: Critical Brutal Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit, gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against the target directly hit.

ability.name: Critical Armor-Piercing
ability.description: On a critical hit, when calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the model hit.

ability.name: Freeze
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Force of Vengeance
spells.description: If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were damaged by enemy attacks while in the spellcaster's Control range during your opponent's last turn, during your Maintenance Phase one model in the spellcaster's battlegroup in its Control range can advance 3” and make one basic attack.

spells.name: Positive Charge
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Positive Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Tactical Supremacy
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [3"] can advance up to 3", then its activation ends.).

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: Checkmate
feat.description: Savaryn can use his Battle Plans three times this activation. Additionally, while in Savaryn's Control range, friendly Faction models ignore cover and concealment when making ranged attacks and their weapons gain Blessed and Damage Type: Arcane. Checkmate lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Sucker!
execution.description: If this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, choose a friendly non-incorporeal warrior model within 3" of it to be directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: At All Costs
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly faction warrior model/unit, if the model/unit is in range it gains Shield Guard for one round.

subabilities.name: Kill Order
subabilities.description: RNG 10. Target enemy model/unit in this model's LOS. While within this model's command range, friendly warrior models gain +2 to accuracy and damage rolls against the chosen model/unit. Kill order lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Precision Strike
subabilities.description:
While within this models command range, friendly models ignore other friendly models when determining LOS. Friendly models can advance through
other friendly models within this model's CMD range if they have enough movement to move completely past them. Precision Strike lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

spells.name: Escort
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spells.name: Icy Grip
spells.description: Target warrior model/unit without resistance: Cold suffers -2 DEF and cannot run or make power attacks or special attacks.

spells.name: Rock Wall
spells.description: Place a wall template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction, or an obstacle. The wall is an obstacle that provides cover.

spells.name: Tides of War
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in it's battlegroup gain Reposition [3"]. Tides of War lasts for one turn. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [3"] can advance up to 3", then its activation ends.).

products.name: Kommander Zoktavir, the Butcher Unleashed and Argui

characterabilities.name: Bond [War Argus]
characterabilities.description: This model begins the game with two War Argus in it's battlegroup and it is bonded to them. While this model is bonded to War Argus, this model gains Vengeance [War Argus]. If a War Argus is destroyed, or removed from the game, this model gains +1 ARC. If both War Argui are destroyed or removed from the game, this model gains Berserk and Retaliatory Strike.

feat.name: Red Haze
feat.description: Zoktavir immediately gains 6 focus points. He cannot have more focus then his current ARC as a result of Red Haze. Living enemy models cannot charge Zoktavir. Red Haze lasts one round.

execution.name: Unwavering
execution.description: This model cannot be pushed, become knocked down, become stationary, be moved by a slam, and never suffers Blind or Shadow Bind.

spells.name: Energizer
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in its Control Range can immediately advance up to 2". Energizer can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Impending Doom
spells.description: Enemy models within 5" of the spellcaster are pushed 5" directly toward it in the order you choose.

spells.name: Obliteration
spells.description: The force of this attack blasts apart the earth itself. All models hit suffer an unboostable POW 15 Arcane damage roll.

spells.name: Silence of Death
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to it's melee attack damage rolls and Takedown.

characterabilities.name: Attached [Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed]
characterabilities.description: This model is attached to Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed and is the same faction as Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed. If Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Flank [Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Kommander Zoktavir The Butcher Unleashed model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Guard Dog
characterabilities.description: While this model is within 3" of it's warlock/warcaster and isn't knocked down or stationary, it's warlock/warcaster gains Unstoppable and +2 DEF against melee attack accuracy rolls and models attacking the warcaster/warlock do not gain back strike bonuses.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Tamed
characterabilities.description: War Argus is a warbeast, but does not have an animi, or a life spiral. Instead it uses a damage track like a warrior model but is not a warrior model. It has no FURY or THR Stat. It can charge or make power attacks without being forced. It does not Frenzy or make Frenzy checks.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

products.name: Lord Kozlov, the Viscount of Scarsgrad

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Iron Fang] [Self-Sacrifice]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Iron Fang models gain Self-Sacrifice. (If this model is disabled by an enemy attack, you can choose a non-disabled model in this unit within 3” of this model to be destroyed and this model removes 1 damage point.)

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Gang Fighter]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Gang Fighter. (A model with Gang Fighter gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls when making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model.)

characterabilities.name: Gang Fighter
characterabilities.description: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model, this model gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Side Step
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

characterabilities.name: Tactician [Iron Fang]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly Iron Fang models can ignore other friendly Iron Fang models when determining LOS. Friendly Iron Fang models can advance through other friendly Iron Fang models in this model's CMD range if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

characterabilities.name: True Strike
characterabilities.description: When this model damages a warjack or warbeast with a melee attack, choose which column or branch suffers the damage.

feat.name: Onrush
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in Kozlov's control range gain +2SPD and ARM, additionally Friendly Faction models activating in Kozlov's control range gain an additional die on charge attack damage rolls. Onrush lasts for one round.

execution.name: Iron Father
execution.description: When a friendly Iron Fang model is destroyed while in this models command range, this model heals 1 damage point. When this model is disabled, it is knocked down instead of becoming boxed and its activation immediately ends. If this model is disabled at the beginning of your maintenance phase it is destroyed.

spells.name: Avalanche
spells.description: On a critical hit, enemy models hit become knocked down.

spells.name: Chosen Ground
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, models in its battlegroup gain Pathfinder and Steady. (A model with Steady cannot be knocked down.)

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

feat.description: Models in Karchev's battlegroup may charge or perform power attacks without spending focus. Additionally, all friendly models ignore all movement penalties and gain Pathfinder.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Eruption
spells.description: This attack causes fire damage. Place a cloud effect template centered on the model targeted. The template is a hazard that remains in play for one round. A model without Resistance: Fire entering or ending its activation in the AOE suffers the Fire continuous effect.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: Frostbite causes cold damage. On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Unearthly Rage

products.name: Obavnik Kommander Zerkova and Reaver Guard

characterabilities.name: Call to Sacrifice [Reaver Guard]
characterabilities.description: If this model is disabled by an enemy attack, you can choose a non-disabled friendly Reaver Guard model within 5" of this model to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Call to Sacrifice, remove 1 damage point from this model.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Khador]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Khador non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Silence]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Silence. (A model hit by this attack cannot cast spells for one round.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Promote: Doom Reaver
characterabilities.description: If this unit at any time has less than two Reaver Guards, you may select one Doom Reaver Grunt in this model's CMD range and replace it with a Reaver Guard Grunt that is now in this model's unit.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

feat.name: Arcane Convergence
feat.description: Each friendly Faction model currency in Zerkova's Control range can immediately cast one spell without spending focus, performing a special action, or performing a special attack.

execution.name: Fell Blade Seal
execution.description: When this model boxes a living enemy warrior model with a melee attack, remove it from play. You can place a Doom Reaver Grunt into play completely within 4" of this model. It becomes a Solo model.

spells.name: Banishing Ward
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Hoarfrost
spells.description: Hoarfrost causes cold damage. On a critical hit, models in the AOE become stationary for one round unless they have Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Occult Whispers
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction models gain an additional die on their magic accuracy rolls. Occult Whispers lasts for one turn.

For each damage dealt this way a model in the spellcaster's battlegroup in the spellcaster's Control Range gains 1 focus. A model may gain no more the 3 focus this way. Sacrificial Lamb can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Berserk

characterabilities.name: Anchor
characterabilities.description: Friendly warrior models cannot be knocked down while B2B with this model.

characterabilities.name: Modular [3] [Head, Left Arm, Right Arm]
characterabilities.description: This model is a modular design and has 3 Hardpoints to choose an option for. During list construction, choose one of the provided options per Hardpoints. The model's total point cost is equal to the point costs of all selected options. This model gains the keywords, abilities, weapons and statistic adjustments of the selected options. If this model is a Warjack or Monstrosity, if the hardpoint is attached to a system, while that system is crippled it loses all abilities gained from that hardpoint.

abilities.name: Evasive
abilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

abilities.name: Overtake
abilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".

abilities.name: Shield Guard
abilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Critical Freeze
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

ability.name: Volume Fire
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against medium-based models and +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

abilities.name: Girded
abilities.description: This model and models B2B with it gain Resistance: Blast.

ability.name: Critical Shred
ability.description: On a critical hit with this weapon during this model's Combat Action, after the attack is resolved this model can make one additional attack with this weapon against the model hit.

characterabilities.name: Berserk
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

characterabilities.name: Bond [Vladimir]
characterabilities.description: If this model begins the game in Vladimir's battlegroup, it is bonded to him. This model is not considered to be bonded while under your opponent's control. While this model is bonded to Vladimir and in his Control range, it gains Restraint. (If a model with Restraint destroys one or more enemy models during this activation, it may choose not make an Unstable roll at the end of its activation.)

characterabilities.name: Chain Attack [Excutioner Axe] [Brutalize]

characterabilities.name: Gung-ho
characterabilities.description: This model can run or charge without spending focus, fury, Essense or using the Hurry! 'jack marshal benefit.

characterabilities.name: Imprint [Jury-Rigged [SPD]]
characterabilities.description: This model can spend 1 focus point at any time during its activation to gain Jury-Rigged [SPD]. (A model with Jury-Rigged can spend 1 focus point to use Jury-Rigged at the start of its activation. This activation, the model gains +2 SPD. At the end of the activation, the model suffers 1 damage point to its first available Movement system box. The model can't use Jury-Rigged if its Movement system is crippled. Jury-Rigged can only be used once per activation.)

characterabilities.name: Unstable
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which this model spent more than 1 focus point, roll a d6. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of focus points spent, this model explodes and other models within 3" of it suffer an unboostable POW 13 Arcane Blast Damage roll with plus 1 POW for each focus point that was spent this activation. Then center a 3” AOE on this model, the AOE is rubble terrain and stays in play the rest of the game. Remove this model from play. This model's battlegroup controller suffers 1 point of damage.

topability.description: At any time during this model's activation, you can mark one or more coin boxes on its card. For each coin box you mark, you can use Paymaster once. When you do, choose one of the following incentives. Incentives are RNG CMD and can target only friendly Steelhead units. A steelhead unit can be affected by only one incentive per turn. When all five of its coin boxes have been marked, this model loses Paymaster for the rest of the game.

characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Rise. (If a model with Rise is knocked down at the beginning of your Maintenance Phase, it stands up.)

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Khador, Llael, Ord]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Khador, Llael, Ord.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar, Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cygnar, Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Spell Breaker
characterabilities.description: When this model hits another model with an attack, enemy upkeep spells on the model hit expire. A spellcaster can keep that upkeep spell in play by suffering d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Weapon Attachment [Small or Medium-based Cygnar or Morrowan]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Small or Medium-based Cygnar or Morrowan unit.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance.

topability.name: Leader Benefits
topability.description: While its Leader is in this model's command range, this model can use one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Lucky Charm (★Action)
subabilities.description: During its activation this turn, this model's warcaster can reroll one attack or damage roll, then Lucky Charm expires.

subabilities.name: Reloader (★Action)
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action this turn, this model's warcaster can make one additional ranged attack.

subabilities.name: Spyglass (★Action)
subabilities.description: Target an enemy model in this model's LOS. That model loses stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Horgenhold Forge Guard]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Horgenhold Forge Guard unit.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Cleave]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Cleave. (When a model with Cleave destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved the model can make one additional melee attack. The model can make only one additional attack as a result of Cleave each activation.)

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth.

characterabilities.name: Reinforcements [Rhulic]
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, return d3 small or medium based friendly destroyed Rhulic Grunts to play. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in their unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Wall of Steel
characterabilities.description: While this model is B2B with one or more models in its unit, it gains +2 ARM.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Combat Coordination
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model. If the target model is in range, during its activation this turn, it can reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Combat Coordination expires.

subabilities.name: Desperate Pace [Forge Guard] (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Forge Guard unit. If the unit is in range, Forge Guard models in that unit gain +2" movement during their Normal Movement this turn.

subabilities.name: Reveille
subabilities.description: Knocked down friendly Faction models in this model's CMD range immediately stand up. Models that became knocked down this turn are not affected by Reveille.

ability.name: Combo Smite (★Attack)
ability.description: The model hit is slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. When resolving damage for this attack, the model hit suffers a damage roll with POW equal to the STR of this model plus twice the POW of this weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Assist
characterabilities.description: If its leader is in this model's CMD range during your Control Phase, the leader can upkeep one spell without spending focus/fury/essence.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Secrets (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target this model's warcaster. If the warcaster is in range, it gains an additional die on magic attack rolls and magic damage rolls for the next spell it casts. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Arcane Secrets lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Searforge Commission.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Ios, Broken Pact]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Ios, Broken Pact armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Spiritual Conduit
characterabilities.description: While its Leader is in this model's command range, when the Leader casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +2 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Girded
characterabilities.description: This model and models B2B with it gain Resistance: Blast.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Searforge Commission armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Periscope
characterabilities.description: This model can use Periscope once per activation at any time. Choose an enemy model in this model's Line of Sight. That model loses Stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Reinforcements [Rhulic]
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, return d3 small or medium based friendly destroyed Rhulic Grunts to play. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in their unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Roadblock
characterabilities.description: This model provides cover to friendly models as if it were an obstacle. This model loses Roadblock while it is incorporeal or knocked down.

ability.name: Critical Stagger
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit loses its inital attacks and cannot make power attacks or special attacks for one round.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
